modDescription:
## Launch

Place the bathtub boat on/in water in a ‘shallow water’ area that has fairly flat ground underneath, if you have no shallow water in your map then build a small launch dock, then add fuel to bath tub boat and off you go.

The Bath tub boat can be placed on land but will barely be able to move (new physics colliders experiment) rendering it unsteerable and very very slow to move.

## Controls

* Steering is A and D as per vanilla setings… mouse is for looking around only and has no affect on steering a boat.
* Space bar and c control the up and down angles (same as a gyro) which you will need to adjust slightly as you travel on water otherwise you may sink.
* W is forwards and S is slow down/reverse. If you let go of w and shift (Turbo) then the boat slowly comes to a stop, pressing S will slow the boat down more quickly this replaces spacebar as the brake key.
* To anchor the bathtub boat and stop it drifting away use c and spacebar to level the boat till it stops drifting, useful if you have a fishing mod installed.

## Anchoring

To anchor the bath boat and stop it drifting away use c and spacebar to level the boat till it stops drifting, useful if you have a [fishing](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-fishing/) mod installed.

## Crafting

The bathtub boat is craftable in a standard workbench with no progression needed at the cost of various resources and by creating the required assemblies to build it, it will help early game if you actually find a ‘working workbench’ and this allow you to make the bath tub a lot sooner.

If anyone wants to change the recipes and build methods then please do so but let him know how you improved it.

## Other

The bathtub boat can be picked up into inventory providing the boats inventory is empty as per normal [vehicles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) if you sink it at any point, although be careful if you sink it too far away from the shores as it could be a long swim back. Best to not store stuff as Zombies now can attack water vehicles in game.

## Changelog

**_(new)_** Bathtub boat and Jetski have had some texture changes, feet and hand positions also altered from original release… not essential that you update but they are both a new version for A20 now.

Experimental work in progress Bathtub version 3.

**Note:** Do not go too near the shore as you may break water blocks in A20 and this will affect player health – if you get health loss due to water block breaking get off the boat quick. Looking into this at present and a way too fix for A20.

**Version 3**

1. Fixed lootlist alive for A20
2. Two in Bath tub option via a modded seat
3. Added vehicle mod options: Fuelsaver, Seat, Reserve tank and cosmetics option
4. Added support to be able to do fishing with [Telrics A20 Fishing](https://7daystodiemods.com/telrics-fishing/) mod

**Version 2**

1. Optimised Model to reduce size of unity file.
2. Added Particles… these can be switched on or off with the F key… (headlight function)
3. Depth mask applied to stop water seeping effect and allow it to ride lower in water for more realism effect.
4. Textures adjusted
5. Added working propeller
